title: Portfolio Website
description: A website built entirely in Python to showcase coding projects and apps.

title: Compress/Extract files
description: A simple application to compress and extract the files and save them at the desired location.

title: Weather API
description: A REST API built with Python to serve historical weather data for various cities.

title: Todo List Manager
description: A distraction-free web app to help you focus on creating and completing tasks. This app is available in both format: web app as well as a downloadable exe file.

title: Password Strength Identifier
description: An App built with Python to identify the strength of password.

title: Convert image into GrayScale images
description: A small app built with Python to convert images into gray scale images.

title: Webcam Motion Detector
description: A program that monitors the computer webcam and sends an email when a new object enters the view.

title: Tour Scraper
description: A program that checks a music band's website and sends an email when there are new tours.

title: PDF Templates
description: A script that generates PDF templates of multiple pages given some predefined guidelines.

title: PDF Invoices
description: A script that reads invoice records from Excel files and automatically generates PDF invoices.

title: Visualizing Weather Forecast
description: A data web app that visualizes the weather forecast for the next five days of any city.
